snippet: Italian authorities recently announced a seizure of antiquities that appear to have been found by looters who stumbled upon the trove while digging to build a garage.
abstract: Italian authorities announce seizure of antiquities that appear to have been found by people who stumbled upon trove while digging to build garage just outside city center, not professional looters of ancient sites who have despoiled countless graves in country for centuries.
lead_paragraph: Italian authorities recently announced a seizure of antiquities that appear to have been found by looters who stumbled upon the trove while digging to build a garage.

headline.seo: Etruscan Artifacts Looted by Amateurs Are Prize Objects
headline.main: Tale of Glorious Art and Not So Glorious Thieves
headline.print_headline: Tale of Glorious Art and Not So Glorious Thieves
